h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Once the Patroller is down, you can find a green Wisp to absorb at the foot of the building to replenish your gourd, but there's not much else here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Once the Patroller is down, you can find a green Wisp to absorb at the foot of the building to replenish your gourd, but there's not much else here.
